recipe.title: Low-Fat Herbed Ranch Dressing
ingredients: 1 tablespoon packed fresh basil leaves, minced
instructions: In a blender or food processor blend all ingredients and salt and pepper to taste until smooth. Dressing keeps, covered and chilled, 1 week. Serve dressing with soft lettuce, shellfish salad, or salmon salad.
